STATE v. PAULINO. No. COA04-749. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed April 5, 2005. Certification Date April 25, 2005. Appeal from Guilford, (02CR099689, 02CR099690, 02CR099691, 02CR099692, 02CR099693, 02CR099694, 02CR099695, 02CR099696, 02CR099697).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
